title: Organic freedom
description: Animals roam on pasture, eat organic feed, and live in low-stress environments.
keyCharacteristics: Year-round grazing access when weather permits

title: High welfare
description: Regular outdoor access, no routine mutilations. Focus on natural behavior and reduced antibiotics.

title: Basic welfare
description: Animals have more room, some daylight, and enrichment. Housing is improved as well.
keyCharacteristics: Group housing for some part of life

title: Bare minimum
description: Slight improvements like a bit more space or limited outdoor time. Some pain relief may be used.

title: Torture camp
description: Animals are kept in feedlots with little or no grazing and are fed large amounts of concentrated feed.
keyCharacteristics: Feed designed for fast weight gain

title: Organic freedom
description: Pigs live outdoors with access to shelters, forage naturally, and families stay together longer.
keyCharacteristics: No routine tail docking or teeth clipping

title: High welfare
description: Outdoor runs or deep bedding, enrichment materials, and no crates for sows.
keyCharacteristics: Access to outdoors or deep bedding

title: Basic welfare
description: More space, straw bedding, group housing for sows (except during farrowing).
keyCharacteristics: Group housing for most of life cycle

title: Bare minimum
description: Small improvements over minimum, slightly more space, some enrichment materials.

title: Torture camp
description: Pigs kept in barren pens, sows in gestation crates, routine tail docking without pain relief.

title: Organic freedom
description: Birds range freely outdoors, forage naturally, and live in small flocks with ample space.
keyCharacteristics: Low stocking density indoors and out

title: High welfare
description: Free-range access, enrichment items indoors, and more space per bird than conventional.
keyCharacteristics: Enrichment like perches and pecking objects

title: Basic welfare
description: Better indoor conditions with natural light, perches, and dust bathing areas.
keyCharacteristics: No outdoor access but improved indoor environment

title: Bare minimum
description: Small improvements to conventional systems, slightly lower stocking density.
keyCharacteristics: Conventional barn system with minor improvements

title: Torture camp
description: Birds kept in overcrowded conditions with poor air quality and no enrichment.
keyCharacteristics: Rapid growth leading to health problems
